msg
I'm worried about you, it would almost kill you! If the environment is unpredictable, are you sure we can be save?

こっちが心配してるのは、あんたの体力のことだ。こんなペースじゃ、橋を渡っても命がもたないぞ！予期せぬ事態が起こっても、対処できるって約束できるのか？

I am worried about your current physical strength, even if you cross the bridge half of your life is lost! If it's an environment we can't predict, can you guarantee that you won't encounter danger?

잠깐 잠깐! 히메코! 차 지붕이 날아갔어! 부서지거나 하진 않겠지!?
Hey! Himeko! The roof of the car is flying off! Are you sure it's not going to explode!
Wait, wait! Himeko! The roof of the car flew off! You're not going to break it, are you?
It's ok! We can hold on for a little more! I will tell you when we should jump out of the car!
没事！还能撑一会！一会我让你们跳的时候一起跳车！
大丈夫よ！あとちょっと！もう少ししてジャンプって言ったら車から飛び降りるのよ！
괜찮아! 좀 더 버텨! 조금 있다가 점프라고 하면 차에서 뛰어내리는 거야!
It's okay! Still can hold out for a while! I will let you jump together when jumping from the car!
I'm okay! I'm okay! Just a little more! When I say jump a little more, you jump out of the car!
If you don't want be caught by those monsters then listen to me!
你不想下车的时候被崩坏生物包围的话就听我的！
崩壊生物に包囲されたくなければ、言うことを聞きなさい！
붕괴 생물에게 포위당하고 싶지 않다면 내 말을 들어!
Listen to me if you don't want to be surrounded by crashing creatures when you get off!
Unless you want to be besieged by disintegrating organisms, do what I say!
そろそろ限界のようね。
Looks like it's time to hit the limit.
Listen! I say three two one and we jump!
听着！我数三二一一起跳！
いい！？私が三つ数えたら飛び降りるわよ！
좋아!? 내가 셋을 세면 뛰어내릴 거야!
Listen up! I count three, two, one, jump together!
Okay! I count to three and then I jump!
ブゥオオオオーーーンッ！！！
Hey hey hey! Even if we gonna jump we also need to slow down! Why you speed up!
喂喂喂！就算要跳也得减速吧！你这加速是什么意思！
おいおい！飛び降りるなら減速すべきだろ！何でスピード上げてんだ！？
이봐! 뛰어내릴 거라면 감속해야지! 왜 속도를 올리고 있는 거야!?
Hey, hey, hey! Even if you want to jump, you have to slow down! What do you mean by speeding up!
Hey, hey, hey! If you're gonna jump, you should slow down! Why are you speeding up?
The further it explodes the safer we are!
它爆炸的越远我们才越安全！
こいつの爆発に巻き込まれたくないでしょ？そのためにはスピードを上げて、離れさせないと！
이 녀석의 폭발에 휘말리고 싶지 않잖아? 그러려면 속도를 올려서 떨어지게 해야지!
The farther it explodes the safer we are!
You don't want to get caught in this guy's explosion. To do that, we need to speed it up and get it away from us!
快乘着崩坏生物被爆炸声吸引赶紧隐蔽起来！
崩壊生物が爆発音に気取られているうちに隠れるわよ！
붕괴 생물이 폭발음에 정신이 팔린 사이에 숨을 거야!
Quickly take advantage of the sound of the explosion to attract the creatures of the collapse to take cover!
We'll hide while the disintegrating creatures are distracted by the sound of explosions!
ふぅ、ふぅ！危うく命を落とすところだった……。
Whew! I almost lost my life. ......
We're not far from the other side, it's much quicker than expected.
这里离大桥的另一头已经不远了，比预想地节约了不少时间。
ここは橋の対岸までそう遠くないわ。最初の予定よりもだいぶ時間を節約できたわね。
여긴 다리 건너편까지 멀지 않아. 원래 계획보다 시간을 많이 절약했네.
This is not far from the other side of the bridge, saving a lot of time than expected.
It's not far from here to the other side of the bridge. We've saved a lot of time compared to our original plan.
Let's go! We've got no time to find a new car! Run now!
走吧！现在可没有时间找新的车辆了！一口气冲过去！
行きましょう！もう新しい車を探している時間はないわ！一気に突破するわよ！
가자! 새 차를 찾을 시간 따윈 없어! 단숨에 돌파하자고!
Let's go! There's no time to find a new vehicle! One breath of air!
Let's go! We don't have time to look for a new car anymore! We're going through it in one fell swoop!
